description:
Franky stands up to Spandam by destroying what the madman desires most, and the sound of the sea train spurs the Straw Hats to make a daring leap of faith!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Not Gonna Hand Over the Blueprints! Franky`s Decision!
Je ne te donnerai pas ces plans ! La décision de Franky !
Sekkeizu wa Watasanai! Franky no Ketsudan
Я не отдам тебе чертежи! Выбор Фрэнки
設計図は渡さない! フランキーの決断
